original_text: See, I have set the land before you. Go in and take possession of the land that the Lord swore to your fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, to give to them and to their offspring after them.’
korean_text: 내가 너희의 조상 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱에게 맹세하여 그들과 그들의 후손에게 주리라 한 땅이 너희 앞에 있으니 들어가서 그 땅을 차지할지니라

sentences.original_text: I have set the land before you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 앞에 그 땅을 두었노라.

sentences.original_text: Go in and take possession of the land
that the Lord swore to your fathers,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너희 조상들에게 맹세하신 그 땅이니,

sentences.original_text: to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.
and to their offspring after them.’
